s172: Five. Jianyu sixth year, Marquis Chi convicted of illegally purchasing fields and residences, and requesting officials' crimes, state abolished.

s181: When troops first arose, as attendant followed uprising in Pei, as Palace Attendant entered Han, returned, achieved merit in obtaining King of Yong Yan's family, used as Chancellor of Changshan, Marquis.

s188: As soldier followed Gaozu uprising in Shanfu, became Lü clan attendant, achieved merit in escorting Empress Lü across the Huai, used as Governor of Henan, Marquis, five hundred households.

s191: Eleven. Twelfth year, Marquis Xiao Bo first year. Three. Fifteenth year, Marquis Bo committed crime, state abolished.
s195: As Lian Ao followed Gaozu breaking Qin, entered Han, as Colonel pacified the nobles, merit compared to Marquis of Chaoyang. Ying died, son Ta inherited merit, used as Grand Master of Ceremonies, Marquis.
s197: Four. Fourth year fourth month bing shen, Marquis Lü Ta first year. Eighth year, Marquis Ta convicted of Lü clan affairs, executed, state abolished.
